text: can you check my registration status for March 25th, 2023?
Sure, may I have your patient ID, please?
Got it. And what is your full name, please?

Thanks. Checking your registration status for March 25th, 2023... Looks like you have an appointment with Dr. Kim on that day. Here are the appointment details: [{'patient_name': 'Robert Lee', 'date': '2023-03-25', 'doctor_name': 'Dr. Kim'}]
Is there anything else I can help with?
Actually, I have been experiencing shortness of breath lately. Can you give me any advice or first aid tips?
I'm sorry to hear that. Please tell me more about your symptoms.
I feel like my breathing is labored and it's harder to catch my breath.

I see. Let me look that up for you... Here are some possible diseases that may cause your symptoms. They are Asthma and Pneumonia. Here are the first aid tips: [{"name": "Asthma", "aid": "Treatment may involve inhalers or nebulizers to open the airways, as well as medications to manage inflammation and prevent attacks."}, {"name": "Pneumonia", "aid": "Treatment may involve antibiotics, rest, and fluids to help the body fight the infection and recover."}]

output.name: Asthma
output.aid: Treatment may involve inhalers or nebulizers to open the airways, as well as medications to manage inflammation and prevent attacks.

output.name: Pneumonia
output.aid: Treatment may involve antibiotics, rest, and fluids to help the body fight the infection and recover.
